titles.title: Designating minority membership on certain standing committees of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The Clerk was authorized to correct section numbers, punctuation, and cross references, and to make other necessary technical and conforming corrections in the engrossment of H. Res. 12.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Designates minority party membership on the following House committees: (1) Agriculture; (2) Appropriations; (3) Banking and Financial Services; (4) Budget; (5) Commerce; (6) Economic and Educational Opportunities; (7) International Relations; (8) Judiciary; (9) National Security; (10) Small Business; (11) Technology and Competitiveness; (12) Transportation and Infrastructure; (13) Veterans' Affairs; and (14) Ways and Means.
